targets.expr:
(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="monitoring", persistentvolumeclaim=~".+prometheus-db.+"})
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="monitoring", persistentvolumeclaim=~".+prometheus-db.+"})
)

(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="monitoring", persistentvolumeclaim="prometheus-grafana"})
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="monitoring", persistentvolumeclaim="prometheus-grafana"})
)
